body:
The hashes for bcrypt and cffi were done by hand, since they were done before the hashin patch was complete. I didn't go back and do the automated version aftewards, sorry.

I just ran `hashin -p 3.5 cffi`, and it added two more hashes, including the one you just failed on. I'll make a PR for that.
body_text:

body_html:
The hashes for bcrypt and cffi were done by hand, since they were done before the hashin patch was complete. I didn't go back and do the automated version aftewards, sorry.

I just ran hashin -p 3.5 cffi, and it added two more hashes, including the one you just failed on. I'll make a PR for that.
